alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Bandera; Bexar; Comal; Guadalupe; Kendall; Kerr; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 12:13AM CDT until May 13 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Medina County in south central Texas... Central Bandera County in south central Texas... Southeastern Kerr County in south central Texas... Southwestern Guadalupe County in south central Texas... Northwestern Atascosa County in south central Texas... Kendall County in south central Texas... Bexar County in south central Texas... Central Comal County in south central Texas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1213 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Camp Verde to near Rio Medina to near Bigfoot, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Medina, Schertz, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Boerne, Selma, Devine, Castroville, Comfort, Bandera, San Antonio Int Airport, Randolph AFB, Stinson Municipal Airport, Canyon Lake, Leon Valley, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch and Kirby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Atascosa; Bandera; Bexar; Comal; Guadalupe; Kendall; Kerr; Medina
